verses.verse: Moses<WH4872> assembled<WH6950> all the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and<WH6950> said<WH559> to them,<WH1697> "These are the words which Yahweh<WH3068> has commanded,<WH6680> that you should do them.<WH6213>

<WH8337> 'Six days<WH3117> shall work<WH4399> be done,<WH6213> but on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> there shall be a holy day<WH6944> for you,<WH7676> a Sabbath of solemn rest<WH7677> to Yahweh:<WH3068> whoever does<WH6213> any work<WH4399> in it shall be put to death.<WH4191>
You shall kindle<WH1197> no fire<WH784> throughout your habitations<WH4186> on the Sabbath<WH7676> day.<WH3117>'"
Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH559> to all the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> "This is the thing<WH1697> which Yahweh<WH3068> commanded,<WH6680> saying,<WH559>

<WH3947> 'Take from among you an offering<WH8641> to Yahweh.<WH3068> Whoever<WH3605> is of a willing<WH5081> heart,<WH3820> let him bring<WH935> it,<WH3068> Yahweh's offering:<WH8641> gold,<WH2091> silver,<WH3701> brass,<WH5178>
blue,<WH8504> purple,<WH713> scarlet,<WH8144> fine linen,<WH8336> goats<WH5795>' hair,
rams<WH352>' skins<WH5785> dyed red,<WH119> sea cow<WH8476> hides,<WH5785> acacia<WH7848> wood,<WH6086>
oil<WH8081> for the light,<WH3974> spices<WH1314> for the anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081> and for the sweet<WH5561> incense,<WH7004>
onyx<WH7718> stones,<WH68> and stones<WH68> to be set<WH4394> for the ephod<WH646> and for the breastplate.<WH2833>
<WH2450>"'Let every wise-hearted man<WH3820> among you come,<WH935> and make<WH6213> all that Yahweh<WH3068> has commanded:<WH6680>
the tabernacle,<WH4908> its outer covering,<WH4372> its roof,<WH168> its clasps,<WH7165> its boards,<WH7175> its bars,<WH1280> its pillars,<WH5982> and its sockets;<WH134>
the ark,<WH727> and its poles,<WH905> the mercy seat,<WH3727> the veil<WH6532> of the screen;<WH4539>
the table<WH7979> with its poles<WH905> and all its vessels,<WH3627> and the show bread;<WH6440>
the lampstand<WH4501> also for the light,<WH3974> with its vessels,<WH3627> its lamps,<WH5216> and the oil<WH8081> for the light;<WH3974>

and the altar<WH4196> of incense<WH7004> with its poles,<WH905> the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> the sweet<WH5561> incense,<WH7004> the screen<WH4539> for the door,<WH6607> at the door of the tabernacle;<WH4908>
the altar<WH4196> of burnt offering,<WH5930> with its grating<WH4345> of brass,<WH5178> it poles,<WH905> and all its vessels,<WH3627> the basin<WH3595> and its base;<WH3653>
the hangings<WH7050> of the court,<WH2691> its pillars,<WH5982> their sockets,<WH134> and the screen<WH4539> for the gate<WH8179> of the court;<WH2691>
the pins<WH3489> of the tabernacle,<WH4908> the pins<WH3489> of the court,<WH2691> and their cords;<WH4340>

the finely worked garments,<WH899> for ministering<WH8278> in the holy<WH6944> place,<WH6944> the holy garments<WH899> for Aaron<WH175> the priest,<WH3548> and the garments<WH899> of his sons,<WH1121> to minister in the priest<WH3547>'s office.'"
All the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> departed<WH3318> from the presence<WH6440> of Moses.<WH4872>

They came,<WH935> everyone<WH376> whose<WH834> heart<WH3820> stirred him up,<WH5375> and everyone whom his spirit<WH7307> made willing,<WH5068> and brought<WH935> Yahweh<WH3068>'s offering,<WH8641> for the work<WH4399> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> and for all of its service,<WH5656> and for the holy<WH6944> garments.<WH899>

They came,<WH935> both<WH5921> men<WH582> and women,<WH802> as many as<WH3605> were<WH5081> willing-hearted,<WH3820> and brought<WH935> brooches,<WH2397> earrings,<WH5141> signet rings,<WH2885> and armlets,<WH3558> all jewels<WH3627> of gold;<WH2091> even every man<WH376> who offered<WH5130> an offering<WH8573> of gold<WH2091> to Yahweh.<WH3068>

Everyone,<WH376> with whom was found<WH4672> blue,<WH8504> purple,<WH713> scarlet,<WH8144> fine linen,<WH8336> goats<WH5795>' hair,<WH352> rams' skins<WH5785> dyed red,<WH119> and sea cow<WH8476> hides,<WH5785> brought them.<WH935>

Everyone who offered<WH7311> an offering<WH8641> of silver<WH3701> and brass<WH5178> brought<WH935> Yahweh<WH3068>'s offering;<WH8641> and everyone,<WH4672> with whom was found acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086> for any work<WH4399> of the service,<WH5656> brought it.<WH935>

All the women<WH802> who were<WH2450> wise-hearted<WH3820> spun<WH2901> with their hands,<WH3027> and brought<WH935> that which they had spun,<WH4299> the blue,<WH8504> the purple,<WH713> the scarlet,<WH8144> and the fine linen.<WH8336>
All the women<WH802> whose heart<WH3820> stirred<WH5375> them up in wisdom<WH2451> spun<WH2901> the goats<WH5795>' hair.
The rulers<WH5387> brought<WH935> the onyx<WH7718> stones,<WH68> and the stones<WH68> to be set,<WH4394> for the ephod<WH646> and for the breastplate;<WH2833>
and the spice,<WH1314> and the oil<WH8081> for the light,<WH3974> for the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> and for the sweet<WH5561> incense.<WH7004>

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> brought<WH935> a freewill offering<WH5071> to Yahweh;<WH3068> every man<WH376> and woman,<WH802> whose<WH834> heart<WH3820> made them willing<WH5068> to bring<WH935> for all the work,<WH4399> which Yahweh<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> to be made<WH6213> by<WH3027> Moses.<WH4872>

Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> "Behold,<WH7200> Yahweh<WH3068> has called<WH7121> by name<WH8034> Bezalel<WH1212> the son<WH1121> of Uri,<WH221> the son<WH1121> of Hur,<WH2354> of the tribe<WH4294> of Judah.<WH3063>
He has filled<WH4390> him with the Spirit<WH7307> of God,<WH430> in wisdom,<WH2451> in understanding,<WH8394> in knowledge,<WH1847> and in all kinds of workmanship;<WH4399>
and to make<WH2803> skillful works,<WH4284> to work<WH6213> in gold,<WH2091> in silver,<WH3701> in brass,<WH5178>
in cutting<WH2799> of stones<WH68> for setting,<WH4390> and in carving<WH2799> of wood,<WH6086> to work<WH6213> in all kinds of skillful<WH4284> workmanship.<WH4399>
He has put<WH5414> in his heart<WH3820> that he may teach,<WH3384> both he,<WH171> and Oholiab, the son<WH1121> of Ahisamach,<WH294> of the tribe<WH4294> of Dan.<WH1835>

He has filled<WH4390> them with wisdom<WH2451> of heart,<WH3820> to work<WH6213> all kinds of workmanship,<WH4399> of the engraver,<WH2796> of the skillful workman,<WH2803> and of the embroiderer,<WH7551> in blue,<WH8504> in purple,<WH713> in scarlet,<WH8144> and in fine linen,<WH8336> and of the weaver,<WH707> even of those who do<WH6213> any<WH3605> workmanship,<WH4399> and of those who make<WH2803> skillful works.<WH4399>
